question: Match the compounds given in List - I with the items given in List - II.

| List - I | List - II |
|---|---|
| I. Benzenesulphonyl Chloride | a. Zwitterion |
| II. Sulphanilic acid | b. Hinsberg reagent |
| III. Alkyl Diazonium salts | c. Dyes |
| IV. Aryl Diazonium salts | d. Conversion to alcohols |
explanation: Alkyl Diazonium salts are unstable and convert to alcohols (d).
Aryl Diazonium salts are used to make Dyes (c).
